notes.logistics: Virtual tournament. Opening Ceremony at 10:30 AM on January 18, 2026.

format.summary: 48 teams compete in 8 divisions of 6 teams each for round-robin play, followed by a 16-team double-elimination bracket

registration.instructions: Fill out the form once per team (rather than once per school). Payment is not due until after the registration deadline, so we can notify all teams who actually have a spot. 48 teams will participate.
